name: Melon Ragdoll Playground.
description:
Melon Ragdoll Playground is an incredible online duel in the battlegrounds full of traps. Сhoose your hero and fight on the one of fantastic playgrounds. Upgrade your weapons, shields, and helpful bonuses. Smash your enemy in the ace PvP battle mode. Play with your friends or players from all over the world.

Become a champion of a royale ragdoll battle!

Features:
- Ragdoll physics
- Play with your friends or players from all over the world online
- Improve your weapon, shields and helpful bonuses
- Get presents and coins, Unlock all achievements
- Train with bots

Do not wait, go in Melon Ragdoll Playground adventures and have a fun.
If you have any question please contact us on mail.
Enjoy the game!
